mapper.select: SELECT R.R_NO ,PM.NAME,R.R_DATE ,S.STARTDATE,R.TIME AS TIME,R.CONTENT AS RCONTENT ,C.CONTENT AS RCCONTENT,FC.CONTENT AS PCONTENT, R.REFUSE, R.CODE,R.R_NO FROM P_MEMBER PM, SERVICE S, RESERVATION R, PET P, F_CODE C, F_CODE FC WHERE PM.P_ID = R.P_ID AND S.R_NO=R.R_NO AND P.PET_NO = R.PET_NO AND C.CODE = R.CODE AND P.CODE = FC.CODE AND P.M_ID = #{m_id} ORDER BY R.R_NO
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RESERVATION R ,PET P WHERE R.PET_NO = P.PET_NO GROUP BY P.M_ID HAVING P.M_ID=#{m_id}
mapper.insert:
SELECT NVL(MAX(R_NO) +1 , 1) AS R_NO FROM RESERVATION
INSERT INTO RESERVATION (R_NO,R_DATE,CONTENT,CODE,PET_NO,TIME,P_ID) VALUES (#{r_no},#{r_date},#{rcontent},#{r_code},#{pet_no},#{time},#{p_id})
mapper.update: UPDATE RESERVATION SET REFUSE = #{refuse}, CODE = 403 WHERE R_NO = #{rno}
